Content: After installing this app to monitor device usage for a class, it completely broke my operating system and I ended up being unable to salvage that device. This app was the only thing it could have been as there were no other apps installed that I hadn't already had for a year before hand. The device no longer gets past the booting screen when turning on, originally, I could turn it on but everything, open or not, would continuously crash everything till it died and could not be shut off.
Love it Really useful, especially for tracking app updates. Doesn't crash, battery and CPU usage is minimal and the notifications aren't too frequent.

Better than the rest, review limited by space
I downloaded cover a few years ago, still in beta, didn't seem to sort what I actually used. I downloaded ms next lock screen, crashed my phone, I downloaded frequency because I figured I could make my own lock screen if I could at least see what I was using the most, failed install many times. Finally, despite the weak app store appeal, I settled for app usage so that I could have one last try at avoiding scrolling through my apps. The next day, the tutorial suggested that I turn on notifications....
Great app but buggy Worked great the first 24 hours but then started crashing repeatedly.
